title: China : weekly box office revenue November 2019 , by movie
yAxis: Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Hollywood Films, and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Hollywood Films on the y axis.
Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has the highest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars and Wings Over Everest has the lowest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 35.8 between the maximum Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and minimum Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Hollywood Filmss.
The maximum Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars 37.3 is found at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and the minimum is found at Wings Over Everest where Hollywood Films is 1.5.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Hollywood Films, and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Hollywood Films on the y axis.
Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has the highest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars and Wings Over Everest has the lowest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 35.8 between the maximum Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and minimum Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hollywood Films in the x axis and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and lowest at Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
There is a difference of 35.8 between the maximum Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and minimum Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 is 37.3 , second place is Two Tigers at 19.6, and thirdly is Knives Out at 13.5.
The average Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in all 10 Hollywood Filmss is 9.25.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is 92.5 if we add up values of all Hollywood Filmss.
